channel.title: NetBeans on DevDrops
channel.description: Recent content in NetBeans on DevDrops

item.title: Xdebug, NetBeans and Vagrant
item.description: Hi! In this short post I’ll describe the steps I’ve made, with the great help of a work colleague, on how to achieve the combination of these great tools together: NetBeans, Xdebug and Vagrant.

item.title: Using PHP CS Fixer on NetBeans 8.0
item.description: Recently on it’s version 8.0 (note: there’s a new stable release, NetBeans 8.0.1 at the present moment), the NetBeans IDE highlighted some new resources for PHP projects. One of the most interesting is the extension for PHP Coding Standards Fixer (A.K.A. PHP CS Fixer).

item.title: Using PHP_CodeSniffer on NetBeans 7.4
item.description: In this first post, I’ll share my basic experience in how to use an important tool to assure and verify your code quality.
